definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Russia accuses Georgia of secretly massing troops for an invasion of Abkhazia.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯指责格鲁吉亚秘密集结军队入侵阿布哈兹。

sentences.english: STEVE EMBER: Georgia O’Keefe received many honors during her long life.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚奥基夫在她漫长生命中获得了许多荣誉。

sentences.english: But it’s Georgia that is most likely to suffer from Putin’s return.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最有可能因为普京的回归而遭殃的是格鲁吉亚。

sentences.english: Georgian fashion designers show their Spring-Summer, 2011 women's collections.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚时装设计师展示2011年春夏女装。

sentences.english: This wounded Georgian woman was later helped by her neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 这位受伤的格鲁吉亚妇女随后被她的邻居救起。

sentences.english: Georgia has not requested assistance, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，格鲁吉亚没有要求援助。

sentences.english: Russia is mobilizing its troops for another showdown with Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯正在调兵遣将，要与格鲁吉亚再决胜负。

sentences.english: This town is for Georgians as Fátima is for Portuguese.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇为格鲁吉亚法蒂玛是为葡萄牙语。

sentences.english: Georgian and South Ossetian officials have accused each other of initiating the hostilities.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚和南奥塞梯官员相互指责对方挑起敌对行动。

sentences.english: Georgia contains some God awful, post-industrial cesspits.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚有一些丑陋不堪的后工业时代的污糟地方。

sentences.english: So perhaps we should not be surprised by the Georgian grab.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们也许不该对格鲁吉亚的被占领感到惊讶。

sentences.english: One principle the West must insist on is the legitimacy of Georgia’s government.
sentences.chinese: 一条原则是，西方必须坚持格鲁吉亚政府的合法性。

sentences.english: A spoof broadcast in Georgia claiming that Russia had invaded the country caused panic.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯已经进攻格鲁吉亚的假消息引起了人们的恐慌。

sentences.english: Complication This paragraph was changed after Georgia objected to the original Franco-Russian phrasing.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚最初反对法俄的用词，这条随后作了修改。

sentences.english: It has attempted to calm relations between Russia and Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 它试图平息俄罗斯与格鲁吉亚之间的关系。

sentences.english: The alliance said the international community strongly reaffirms its su ort for the territorial integrity of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 北约表示，国际社会强烈重申支持格鲁吉亚领土完整。

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
